New Records: Gunnar Henderson tied a franchise record for shortstops with his 34th home run
Key Match Events: The Baltimore Orioles extended Chicago’s losing streak to 11 with a 13-3 rout of the White Sox
Mullins homered to right (362 feet), Cowser scored
Post-Match Reflections: The Baltimore Orioles extended Chicago’s losing streak to 11 with a 13-3 rout of the White Sox
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the 2nd game of the 3-game series between the White Sox and Orioles
